description: [BPFDoor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1161) set's it's process to ignore the following signals; `SIGHUP`, `SIGINT`, `SIGQUIT`, `SIGPIPE`, `SIGCHLD`, `SIGTTIN`, and `SIGTTOU`.(Citation: Deep Instinct BPFDoor 2023)
